# new()

**Type Method**

Creates and initializes a download task.

## Declaration

```swift
class func new() -> Self
```

## Discussion

Don’t use this method to manually create download tasks. Instead, use the factory methods on [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] to add tasks to an existing URL session.

## Creating download tasks

- **init()**: Initializes a download task.
title: new()
